english_definition: used as a greeting or to begin a phone conversation
representative_example_japanese: こんにちは、はじめまして。
additional_examples: [{"context":"phone_conversation","korean":"여보세요, 안녕하세요.","english":"Hello, this is speaking.","japanese":"もしもし、こんにちは。","chinese":"喂，你好。"},{"context":"formal_meeting","korean":"안녕하세요, 오늘 회의에 참석해 주셔서 감사합니다.","english":"Hello everyone, thank you for attending today's meeting.","japanese":"こんにちは皆様、本日は会議にご参加いただきありがとうございます。","chinese":"大家好，感谢您参加今天的会议。"}]
grammar_patterns: [{"pattern_id":"greeting_basic","type":"greeting_expression","description_korean":"기본 인사 표현 패턴","structure_korean":"[인사말] + [존댓말 어미]","examples":"안녕하세요,안녕히 계세요"},{"pattern_id":"greeting_with_response","type":"conversation_pattern","description_korean":"인사와 응답 패턴","structure_korean":"[인사말] + [응답] + [추가 질문/대화]"}]
learning_activities: [{"type":"flashcard","front":"{target_word}","back":"{source_word}\\n{definition}"},{"type":"typing","prompt":"다음 단어를 입력하세요: {source_word}","answer":"{target_word}"},{"type":"pronunciation","target":"{target_word}","phonetic":"{pronunciation}"},{"type":"reading_comprehension","passage":"인사는 사람들 사이의 기본적인 소통 방법입니다.","question":"한국어에서 가장 일반적인 정중한 인사말은 무엇입니까?","options":"안녕,안녕하세요,좋은 아침,반갑습니다","correct":"안녕하세요"}]

korean_synonyms: a round fruit with firm white flesh and a green red or yellow skin
japanese_definition: I would like an apple please.
japanese_part_of_speech: りんごを一つください。
